Package de.eldoria.eldoutilities.threading

Class AsyncSyncingCallbackExecutor

java.lang.Object
de.eldoria.eldoutilities.threading.ReschedulingTask
de.eldoria.eldoutilities.scheduling.QueuingSelfSchedulingTask<AsyncSyncingCallbackExecutor.Callback<?>>
de.eldoria.eldoutilities.threading.AsyncSyncingCallbackExecutor
@Deprecated public final class AsyncSyncingCallbackExecutor extends QueuingSelfSchedulingTask<AsyncSyncingCallbackExecutor.Callback<?>>
Deprecated.
Use BukkitFutureResult instead.
Scheduler Service which allows to execute a async call and handle the retrieved data in the main thread. Preserves the main thread from overloading
